    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalPlayer

        public LocalPlayer​(java.lang.String name,
                   Stone colour,
                   int boardDim,
                   boolean GUI)
        Creates a new local player object.
        Parameters:
        name - of this player
        colour - of the stones of this player
        boardDim - if using a GUI, the board dimensions have to be set // TODO ergens afleiden?
        GUI - start a GUI (note: only one GUI can be started per VM)
        Requires
        name is not null, Stone is either BLACK or WHITE
        Ensures
        the Name of this player will be name, the Stone of this player will be colour

    • Method Detail

      • determineMove

        public int determineMove​(Board board)
        Asks the user to input the field where to place the next stone, via the associated TUI
        Specified by:
        determineMove in class Player
        Parameters:
        board - the game board
        Returns:
        the player's chosen field
        Requires
        board is not null
        Ensures
        the returned int is a valid and empty field index and not recreating previous board state (checked on board clone)

        Returns:
